Format x24 - 24 bit(s) 0
AE_MOVT32X2 00111011 10100
ae_fld_cmov_v 3210
ae_fld_cmov_v0 3210
t2 210

Assembler Syntax

AE_MOVT32X2 aed0..15(ae_cmov_v), aed0..15(ae_cmov_v0), b0..15(bt2)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern void AE_MOVT32X2(ae_int32x2 d /*inout*/, ae_int32x2 d0, xtbool2 bhl);

Description

AE_MOVT32X2 If bhl[0] is set, copy the contents of d0.L to d.L; if bhl[1] is set, copy the contents of d0.H to d.H.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ae_cmov_v Mstage, ae_cmov_v0 Mstage, bt2 Mstage ae_cmov_v Mstage

Protos that use AE_MOVT32X2

proto AE_MOVEQZ_32 { inout ae_int32 a, in ae_int32 b, in ae_int32 test_value }{ae_int32 zero, xtbool2 bhl}{
AE_MOVI zero, 0;
AE_EQ32 bhl, test_value, zero;
AE_MOVT32X2 a, b, bhl;
}
proto AE_MOVLTZ_32 { inout ae_int32 a, in ae_int32 b, in ae_int32 test_value }{ae_int32 zero, xtbool2 bhl}{
AE_MOVI zero, 0;
AE_LT32 bhl, test_value, zero;
AE_MOVT32X2 a, b, bhl;
}
proto AE_MOVT32X2 { inout ae_int32x2 d, in ae_int32x2 d0, in xtbool2 bhl }{}{
AE_MOVT32X2 d, d0, bhl;
}
proto AE_MOVTP24X2 { inout ae_p24x2s d, in ae_p24x2s d0, in xtbool2 bhl }{}{
AE_MOVT32X2 d, d0, bhl;
}
proto FSQRT.S { out xtfloat r, in xtfloat s }{xtbool2 b2, xtfloatx2 t0, xtfloatx2 zero, xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3, xtfloatx2 t4, xtfloatx2 t5, xtfloatx2 t6, xtfloatx2 t7, xtfloatx2 t8}{
CONST.S zero, 0;
CONST.S t5, 1;
OEQ.S b2, s, zero;
AE_MOV t0, s;
AE_MOVT32X2 t0, t5, b2;
RSQRT0.S t1, t0;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
MUL.S r, t1, s;
}
proto FSQRT.SX2 { out xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s }{xtbool2 b2, xtfloatx2 t0, xtfloatx2 zero, xtfloatx2 t1, xtfloatx2 t2, xtfloatx2 t3, xtfloatx2 t4, xtfloatx2 t5, xtfloatx2 t6, xtfloatx2 t7, xtfloatx2 t8}{
CONST.S zero, 0;
CONST.S t5, 1;
OEQ.S b2, s, zero;
AE_MOV t0, s;
AE_MOVT32X2 t0, t5, b2;
RSQRT0.S t1, t0;
MUL.S t2, s, t1;
CONST.S t3, 3;
MUL.S t4, t3, t1;
MSUB.S t5, t2, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t4, t5;
MUL.S t6, s, t1;
MUL.S t7, t3, t1;
CONST.S t8, 1;
MSUB.S t8, t6, t1;
MADDN.S t1, t7, t8;
MUL.S r, t1, s;
}
proto MOVT.SX2 { inout xtfloatx2 r, in xtfloatx2 s, in xtbool2 t }{}{
AE_MOVT32X2 r, s, t;
}
